TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMarshal extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMarshal abstract sealed

summary.span: Fornece métodos auxiliares para marshaling dos dados entre o .NET Framework e Windows Runtime.

span.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As exceções na seção de exceções, além de qualquer `HRESULT` diferente de `S_OK` que é retornado pela fábrica subjacente método terá o marshaling realizado como uma exceção.In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
